summary: In Colombia, a young surfer meets the woman of his dreams - and then meets her uncle, Pablo Escobar.
cast: Josh Hutcherson|Benicio Del Toro|Brady Corbet|Claudia Traisac|Tenoch Huerta|Ana Girardot|Carlos Bardem|Juan Francisco Selles|Laura Londoño|Lauren Ziemski|Frank Spano|Álex Quiroga|Manuel Antonio Gómez|Micke Moreno|Henry Twohy|Elmis Castillo|Jaime Correa|Larry Diaz|RoChia|Luis Antonio Gotti|Jeily Alejandra Ramirez Ibañez|César Vargas|Hedras Urrego|Nyra Soberón Torchia|Aaron Zebede|Henry Bravo|Elkin Correa|Haiman Shabetay|David Noreña|Julio Rueda|Rasiel Rodríguez|Mario Miranda|Jose Hernandez|Golan Shabetay|Gabriel Lezcano|Agustín Goncalves|Gilbert Castro|Alberto Saa|Robert Quintero|Ángel Gutiérrez|Maryluz Barrera|Javier Morales|Jorge García|Grismel Rangel|Gabriel Pérez Matteo|Zuisteen Gaitan|Katterine Miranda|Rossana Uribe|Jiame Correa|Nancy Reagan|Ronald Reagan
title: Escobar: Paraíso perdido
